title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Anyone know of any AI programmes that produce good images ?There’s plenty out there that produce artistic images or random images, but I can’t seem to find any that produce an image that can be used , for example, adverts, SEO stuff etc.Thanks in advance

comments.author: zezaiement
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on June 01, 2023, 06:33:01 PMAnyone know of any AI programmes that produce good images ?There’s plenty out there that produce artistic images or random images, but I can’t seem to find any that produce an image that can be used , for example, adverts, SEO stuff etc.Thanks in advance  There's nothing useful for free, from what I have tried, compared to midjourney.To make images like that, you might want to buy professional plan from midjourney. AI is most progressive on the market at the moment.

comments.author: Filicius
comments.body: After a fast search, I've found this advertorial of 7 AI programmes for advertising image creation. Some of them are paid and others work with free credits.I don't know whether you are willing to pay or you're simply searching for high quality free tools, but I think that both ways a fast read can be helpful.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Thanks for your help both.It appears I’ll have to pay for something decent unfortunately, but I’ll dig a bit deeper
